Hostel: Part II

Ano: 2007

Classificação: 5.5

Sinopse: Three female college students take a detour from their partying, enticed by a beautiful European woman who promises seclusion, safety, and maybe even romance. What they get is a living hell in which they are sold to the highest bidder, whose fondest wish is to kill them slowly. Hostel 2 also follows two American men who are willing to pay to join an exclusive club where a life will end at their hands--any way they like. It's a story of human monsters and the almighty dollar as only Eli Roth could tell it.—Paul Nomad of Dreadcentral.com
